section-1.heading: Stay Connected
section-1.details: In this age of communication, keep in touch with your contacts across the internet without access to an active internet connection. Store your access to your favourite communications platforms while online, use them while offline.

section-2.heading: How it works
section-2.details: With SMSWithoutBorders, you can send emails, tweet and chat on telegram without an active internet connection. By using our app, you can send messages securely through a network of SMS gateways to stay connected
section-2.paragraph-1: By setting up your account while you have an internet connection, you can continue to communicate later using SMS when your no longer have internet access
section-2.paragraph-2: Our SMS gateways are freely available. Learn how to set up yours below
section-2.tutorial-1: Learn how to setup your account and app
section-2.tutorial-2: Learn how to setup gateway clients

section-3.heading: Getting Started with SWOB
section-3.details: With SMSWithoutBorders, you can send emails, tweet and chat on telegram without an active internet connection. By using our app, you can send messages securely through a network of SMS gateways to stay connected

1.heading: Signup for an account
1.details: Register for an SMSWithoutBorders account with a valid phone number, thats it. All other details are optional

2.heading: Connect Accounts
2.details: Securely Link your accounts on platforms we support like Gmail, twitter and telegram using OAuth2 technology so that you can continue to communicate on them when offline. We only request the bare minimum permissions for our services to work. You can learn more in our privacy policy

3.heading: Synchronize Mobile App
3.details: Synchronize your linked account with the SMSWithoutBorders mobile app. This process ensures your can communicate begin securely over SMS. The app will generate unique keys for obfuscating your messages.

4.heading: Setup Gateways
4.details: SMSWithoutBorders relies on gateways to ensure communication. We maintain some but you can also setup your own. By doing so, you will be helping other users on the network communicate through your gateway. Gateway owners can also use their gateways for bulk messaging.

section-3.tutorial-1: Learn how to setup your your account and app
section-3.tutorial-2: Learn how to setup gateway clients

1.heading: Accessibility
1.details: SWOB’s mobile app allows users to have offline communication wherever they are. With as simple as having an SMS message smartphone you can maintain communications with your online platforms

2.heading: Security
2.details: SWOB transmits messages in securely encrypted formats. This secures every communication from being accessed by intermediate parties while in transit.

3.heading: Open source
3.details: Every component of SWOB is open sourced! From the mobile app to the routing mechanisms we use to get your SMS messages to reach your intended platforms

4.heading: Decentralized
4.details: SWOB is built to work in decentralized models. Anyone can host a SWOB server. It’s as easy as understanding how to use it

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.details: Using SWOB is as easy as authenticating your credentials

downloads.heading: Downloads
downloads.details: Stay Connected with our mobile apps and other resources

section-2.heading: Operating Systems
section-2.details: Custom gateway client OS images for raspberry pi

code-verification.heading: Verification
code-verification.paragraph-1: A verification code has been sent to your phone. Please enter it below. This process confirms the number provided is active and can be used for communication when the time comes.
code-verification.paragraph-2: We also require you to provide the code sent to you by SMS as a means of guaranteeing you have the necessary (own) rights to the required phone number. This will help us prevent actors from using non consented phone numbers to create accounts - preventing the owners from further doing so

error-messages.otp-request: Sorry we could not verify your phone number. If error persists, please contact support
error-messages.otp-validation: Sorry we could not verify your code. If error persists, please contact support
